title: Bug 114470 - Error message thrown when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, the filter should work without any errors.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the table filter.
3. Use the value new Date('3/2/2005') for filtering.
4. Save and preview the filter.
5. Verify that the filter works without any error messages.
